full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DPAL LDAN LHA MO' BAm SKONGS KYI CHO GA NYES PA KUN SEL ZHES BYA BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @013B ZHES DPAL LDAN LHA MO 'DOD KHAMS DBANG PHYUG MA'I THUGS DAM BSKANG PA DANG, ,'GAL RKYEN GYI 'TSUB LHAN SOGS ZHI BA LA MCHOG TU BSNGAGS PA, SROG CHAGS RGYU SKONGS DANG, BAm SKONG KYI CHO GA @014A *, ,NYES PA KUN SEL ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, SPYIR YANG SNYIGS MAR SBYONG BA'I DBANG GIS MA MO MKHA' 'GRO 'KHRUGS PA'I 'TSUB LHANGS KYIS BSKYED PA'I NAD GDON SHIN TU MANG BA DANG, LHAG PAR LO SNGA PHYIR NYE BSKOR DU NAD RIMS RIGS MI 'DRA BA MANG DU 'CHED CING, MI SHIS PA'I LTAS MTSAN SNA TSOGS BYUNG BA, BSRUNG MA'I 'KHU LDOG GI RNAM PA YIN PA DANG, BSKONGS BSHAGS MANG DU BTANG NA LEGS PA'I MTSAN MA KUN RTOGS KYI RE MOR SHAR BZHIN, LAG LEN DU BSTAR SKABS, ^BTZUN GZUGS DHARMA BADZRA GYIS BAm SKONGS KYI CHO GA LHO BRAG GRUB CHEN LAS KYI @014B RDO RJE'I GSUNG LA TSIGS PHRANG CUNG ZAD BSGYUR CING, LAG LEN GSAL BAR BGYIS TE, DBEN GNAS BDE CHEN CHOS GLING DU KLAG CHOG CHU 'BABS SU BKOD PA 'DIS KYANG MI MTHUN NYER 'TSE THAMS CAD ZHI ZHING, 'DOD KHAMS DBANG MO DGYES PAS 'PHRIN LAS RNAM BZHI LHUN GYIS GRUB PAR GYUR CIG ,'DI GNYAN PAS, GAR THONG THONG DU BYA MI RUNG GSUNG PASSNOD MIN LA GSANG SHING SKABS SHES PAR BYA'O,, ,,BKRA SHIS, ,
